keyMoments.title: Hasshoken Fighting Style Revealed
keyMoments.description: The Happo Navy's signature fighting style, Hasshoken, is revealed as a martial art from Kano Country that uses vibrations to create shockwaves.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the unique combat technique that defines the Happo Navy's fighting prowess.

keyMoments.title: Sai Demonstrates Leadership
keyMoments.description: Sai, as the 13th leader of the Happo Navy, avenges his vice-leader Boo's defeat by defeating Kelly Funk.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the loyalty and protective nature of the Happo Navy's leadership structure.

origin.foundingPurpose: Military and pirate organization from Kano Country

goals: Compete in the Corrida Colosseum tournament to win the Mera Mera no Mi
notableAchievements: Led by legendary pirate Don Chinjao who had a bounty over 500 million berries
Masters of the Hasshoken martial arts technique
Represents Kano Country in international affairs

reveals.information: The Happo Navy uses Hasshoken, a martial art that controls vibrations to generate shockwaves
The crew is led by numbered leaders, with Sai being the 13th leader and Chinjao being the retired 12th leader
The Happo Navy originates from Kano Country
